feed.title: GitHub HCL Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of HCL in GitHub

entry.title: Azure/terraform-azurerm-avm-res-storage-storageaccount
entry.summary: This Terraform module is designed to create Azure Storage Accounts and its related resources, including blob containers, queues, tables, and file shares. It also supports the creation of a storage account private endpoint which provides secure and direct connectivity to Azure Storage over a private network.

entry.title: gauri17-pro/terraform-jenkins-eks
entry.summary: Deploying EKS Cluster using Terraform and Jenkins

entry.title: HENNGE/terraform-aws-ecs
entry.summary: Terraform module which creates ECS (EC2 and Fargate) and related resources (autoscaling, cron fargate, etc.) on AWS
